issue.title: Move order id in the recaps in the H1 element
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We have proposed to add the ID of the order in the h2 title, near the name.
Problem is, this can be confusing since many orders have an 'automatic' name containg a date. (This gives "Order: My UserName - 2015-12-02 21:15 - 198566")
It would be easier for users (clients AND providers) if ID was in the H1 title.

Proposed layout:
!move_id_in_h1_title.png!



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
